    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiResponse checkHandle(String handle)
      Checks if a specific handle is already taken.
      ApiResponse checkKYC(String userHandle, String userPrivateKey)
      Returns whether entity attached to user handle is verified, not valid, or still pending.
      ApiResponse deleteWallet(String userHandle, String userPrivateKey) 
      ApiResponse getAccounts(String userHandle, String userPrivateKey)
      Gets basic bank account names linked to user handle.
      ApiResponse getTransactions(String userHandle, SearchFilters filters, String userPrivateKey)
      Gets array of user handle's transactions with detailed status information.
      ApiResponse getWallet(String userHandle, String userPrivateKey)
      Gets details about the user wallet used to generate the usersignature header..
      ApiResponse getWallets(String userHandle, SearchFilters filters, String userPrivateKey)
      Gets a paginated list of "wallets"/blockchain addresses attached to a user handle.
      ApiResponse issueSila(String userHandle, int amount, String accountName, String userPrivateKey)
      Debits a specified account and issues tokens to the address belonging to the requested handle.
      ApiResponse linkAccount(String userHandle, String accountName, String publicToken, String accountNumber, String routingNumber, String accountType, String userPrivateKey)
      Uses a provided Plaid public token to link a bank account to a verified entity.
      ApiResponse plaidSameDayAuth(String userHandle, String accountName, String userPrivateKey)
      Request a public_token for plaid's same day microdeposit auth.
      ApiResponse redeemSila(String userHandle, int amount, String accountName, String userPrivateKey)
      Burns given amount of SILA at the handle's blockchain address and credits their named bank account in the equivalent monetary amount.
      ApiResponse register(User user)
      Attaches KYC data and specified blockchain address to an assigned handle.
      ApiResponse registerWallet(String userHandle, Wallet wallet, String walletVerificationSignature, String userPrivateKey)
      Adds another "wallet"/blockchain address to a user handle.
      ApiResponse requestKYC(String userHandle, String kycLevel, String userPrivateKey)
      Starts KYC verification process on a registered user handle.
      ApiResponse silaBalance(String host, String address)
      Gets Sila balance for a given blockchain address.
      ApiResponse transferSila(String userHandle, int amount, String destination, String destinationAddress, String userPrivateKey)
      Starts a transfer of the requested amount of SILA to the requested destination handle.
      ApiResponse updateWallet(String userHandle, String nickname, boolean status, String userPrivateKey)
      Updates nickname and/or default status of a wallet.
